Technique: FORMED BY HAND; PAINTED; ENGRAVED; FAYENCE
Name: Necklace
Description: This beautiful necklace has been reconstructed from elements found in the tomb of Kheti at Beni Hassan. It is composed of five rows of small stems coloured black and turquoise and of two shoulder pieces in the form of falcon heads  "wesekh" type). It seems that the collar was never worn, but played a part in the funerary rites of the owner.
